import * as React from 'react' import './css/App.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function App (): JSX.Element { const isActive = (link: string): string => { return useLocation().pathname === link ? 'active' : '' } return (
